title: Add --project filter to tk ready
description:
Add --project filter flag to ready command in cmd/ready.go.

Implementation:
- Add --project string flag
- Filter ready (unblocked) ticks to those matching project
- Combine with existing ready logic

Test cases:
- Ready with project filter returns only matching unblocked ticks
- Ticks without project excluded
acceptance_criteria: Filter works, combines with ready logic, tests pass
